name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Jose Antonio MARRERO, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
Chief Justice CAPPY, and Justice CASTILLE, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER and Justice BALDWIN join the per curiam remand.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Jose Antonio MARRERO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of November, 2006, we VACATE the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Erie County and REMAND for proceedings consistent with Commonwealth v. Miller, 585 Pa. 144, 888 A.2d 624 (2005).
Chief Justice CAPPY, and Justice CASTILLE, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER and Justice BALDWIN join the per curiam remand.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Michael Wiseman, Esq., Philadelphia, Jose Antonio Marrero.
James Kenneth Vogel, Esq., Amy Zapp, Esq., Erie, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
909 A.2d 802
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Jose Antonio MARRERO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Aug. 28, 2003.
Decided Nov. 21, 2006.
Michael Wiseman, Esq., Philadelphia, Jose Antonio Marrero.
James Kenneth Vogel, Esq., Amy Zapp, Esq., Erie, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
